data.name: 蛛丝-Gossamer Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a text-based horror game with heavy reasoning elements where players will experience three different worlds to uncover the behind secrets. Only by collecting remarkable information to make appropriate choices, can you help the main character get rid of those dreading worlds with ghosts and break the shackles of fate.

You will get started in the school and encounter unexplained phenomena such as classmates who do not exist in the reality, but they have been recorded in your diary, the only class that is held in the whole school and your memory which has been tampering constantly.

Please select your options carefully because to be on a roll or to suffer endless torment depend on what you choose.

However, those supernatural events are just the tip of the iceberg. More paranormal existences are watching and waiting for you. Can you find the truth? Can you solve the mystery? Can you change your fate? Finally, are you prepared for setting out on this journey? They hope you are getting ready as they are coming soon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 2000/XP/7/10/Vista
  • Processor: 1000MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Memory 128MbDirectX：Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Psychic, horror, mystery, suspense, with a violent plot
